name: Midas mFARM
description: mFARM is designed to track the performance of a diversified set of yield strategies deployed across on-chain markets, with a focus on stablecoin-based opportunities. The strategy aims to provide broad exposure to stablecoin yield sources, balancing protocol risk and market dynamics through diversified allocation. The underlying strategy is monitored by Farm Capital, acting as the appointed Risk Manager, responsible for overseeing risk parameters, protocol selection, and ongoing performance monitoring.
